Main Content Region



Meet the Team









Meet the Outreach and Student Recruitment Team
The CSUSB Office of Outreach and Student Recruitment is staffed by a team of dedicated professional staff focused on helping students transition to CSUSB. Our team is here to help you, and we invite you to meet with an outreach counselor or a member of our visitor services team. 


Tiffany Bonner, Ed.D.
Director of Outreach and Student Recruitment
tiffany.bonner@csusb.edu

 
 
To meet our partners in the
Office of Admissions
please visit their website!

Click Here to Meet our Admissions and Operations Team




Outreach Counselors and Recruiters
Outreach Counselors and Recruiters hit the road often around the State of California to help prospective students and their families navigate the admissions process to California State University, San Bernardino.  Catch us at multiple college fairs and schools throughout the year. These visits are a great opportunity for interested students to learn how to get prepared to apply to our campus and why you should pick California State University, San Bernardino for your undergraduate career. Most Pre-Admission advisement sessions will be via Zoom. You must have access to a computer, tablet, or smartphone with speaker and microphone access. For additional technical requirements for Zoom, visit the Zoom Testing Computer or Device web page.
San Bernardino Campus

Local Service Area and Territories
San Bernardino County: Apple Valley, Chaffey, Colton, Fontana, Hesperia, Morongo, Redlands, Rialto, Rim of the World, San Bernardino, Victor Valley, and Yucaipa.
Riverside County: Banning, Beaumont, Coachella Valley, Desert Sands, Jurupa Valley, Moreno Valley, Palm Springs, and Riverside.




Visitor Services
The Office of Outreach and Student Recruitment offers a variety of services, campus tours, special programs, and events for prospective undergraduate students, families, counselors, and community members. Meet the members of our visitor services team. 





Luis Cazares-Cazares
Student Services Specialist
